name: Airial Travel
tagline: Plan dream trips instantly from ideas or travel videos
description: Just imagine your trip and Airial it! Simply describe your trip to Airial, or drop in your favourite TikToks / IG and see your dream trip come to life instantly. Airial's one-of-a-kind AI picks out every last detail so that you can start packing, stress-free!

name: Atlas.co 2.0
tagline: The first no-code platform for spatial apps
description: Atlas lets you build powerful spatial apps without writing code. Upload your spatial data, connect to APIs, and spreadsheets - all from your browser. Whether itâ€™s inspections, site selection, or dashboards, you can go from idea to interactive maps in minutes.

name: Leadsourcing
tagline: Turn anonymous visitors into qualified leads instantly.
description: Leadsourcing reveals potential customers behind your website traffic. We enrich their profiles with emails, roles, and LinkedIn info, then send them to your Slack or Discord in real-time. Engage smarter. Act faster. Close more deals.

name: Alice 3.0
tagline: AI Automation tool that talks to Make, Zapier & your API
description: AI Automation Assistant that works with Make Zapier and your APIs âœ”ï¸Ž Connect your apps to LLM via no-code âœ”ï¸Ž All models in one app âœ”ï¸Ž Fast, secure, privacy focused (offline models) âœ”ï¸Ž Developer friendly; connect your back-end âœ”ï¸Ž Assistant Library Try free ðŸ†“

name: linktime
tagline: Become the superhero of LinkedIn social selling.
description: Are your LinkedIn comments going unnoticed? With linktime, play the social warming game and boost your visibility. Capture prospects' attention and stay on their radar easily: spot key posts, comment with eye-catching GIFs and images, and track conversations.

name: SyncTasks
tagline: A minimalist to-do app for iOS
description: A simpler way to manage your tasks. Sync your tasks from Notion, Apple Reminders, or create new lists with SyncTasks.

name: Supavoice
tagline: Voice to text app for macos
description: Supavoice turns speech into perfectly formatted text in any Mac app. Dictate emails, notes, and posts with smart formatting modes. One-time purchase, uses your own OpenAI API key - you control the costs. Say it, format it, done.

name: Nash
tagline: AI that interacts with any app, service, or file.
description: A more powerful variant of ChatGPT Desktop or Claude Desktop, with a built-in single MCP that lets you use literally any API, app, or local file.

name: Dragonfly
tagline: A better Bluesky experience starts with drafts and bookmarks
description: Dragonfly is an app client for Bluesky, built by SÃ©bastien and InÃ¨s Gruhier. Now available on desktop (macOS) and iPad, coming soon to iPhone, Android, Windows, and Linux. Get more out of Bluesky with exclusive features like bookmarks and drafts.

name: Ideogram 3.0
tagline: Now with stunning realism and consistent styles
description: Meet Ideogram 3.0 â€” stunning realism, creative designs, and consistent styles, all in one powerful model. Now available to all users on ideogram.ai and their iOS app!

name: Newsletter Builder 2.0
tagline: Design and style your newsletter as you write
description: With our all-new editor experience, you can create multiple unique templates and then switch between them within the same publication. No time to build from scratch? No sweat â€” weâ€™ve designed a handful of pre-built newsletter templates to get you started.

name: Mureka O1
tagline: The AI music model that thinks
description: Meet Mureka O1, it uses Chain-of-Thought (CoT) for structured AI music, claiming superior quality to Suno. Offers 10 languages, voice cloning, API & unique model fine-tuning.

name: Zavimo
tagline: One app for all your work
description: Zavimo is an AI-powered work management platform designed to help teams stay organized, collaborate, and boost productivity. From task management and custom workflows to AI-driven insights, Zavimo simplifies work so teams can focus on what matters most.

name: MeshifAI
tagline: Text-To-3D Generation Platform For Developers
description: Transform text into 3D models instantly with MeshifAI. Our advanced AI technology helps developers integrate high-quality 3D generation into apps, games, and websites.

name: Researcher & Analyst in M365 Copilot
tagline: Reasoning Agents for Complex Work
description: Meet Researcher & Analyst, new reasoning agents in M365 Copilot. They handle deep research (work+web) & complex data analysis, providing expert insights within your workflow.

name: Discord New Game Overlay
tagline: Revamped overlay & refreshed desktop give game time a boost
description: A completely new version of the Game Overlay with expanded game support and better performance, along with a refreshed look for the desktop app that brings new ways to tweak and customize Discord to make it work best for you.

name: IsleGrow: Your Habits, Your World
tagline: Build healthy habits. Build your island. Build yourself.
description: Make healthy habits fun! Complete your daily routine, build a houseâ€”day by day. Stick with it, and each month youâ€™ll build a brand new island. Explore expert-designed, simple challenges that help you build lasting habitsâ€”one step at a time.

name: Competitor Ad Tracker
tagline: See competitor's active ads using Chrome
description: Want to know what ads your competitors are running? Competitor Ad Tracker by Adsby is a browser extension that automatically reveals competitor ads as you visit their websites. No setup, no manual searches - just browse!

name: Page Flows
tagline: Real UX flows. Real inspiration.
description: Explore real user flow recordings and screenshots from top web and mobile apps. Discover how innovative products handle onboarding, checkout, and upgradesâ€”all in one place. Quickly search, filter, and bookmark UX insights to design better experiences.

name: Polly in Presentations
tagline: Interactive Q&A, polls & wordclouds in Slack + presentations
description: Take Polly to the next level in your town halls, customer meetings and beyond. The only product that works seamlessly across Slack, the web and presentations to ensure that your team can participate regardless of where they're working or when they're watching.
